I wouldn't be too worried over this.... I would consider staying away from this woman if she has an ACTIVE infection. If you and your son are tested... you should know that the majority of the population has a positive EBV titer (IGG), which is indicative of a past infection. If you have a current infection, then you simply need to rest, drink plenty of fluids and follow your physician's advice.If she has CFS and has been ill for over 6 months, I would have some compassion for her. Very few people who have this invisible illness get sympathy... trust me.
